==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|people|mountain|people|sea}}

===Etymology===
A [[chengyu]] expressing the idea of "a mountain ({{m|zh|山}}) of people ({{m|zh|人}}), a sea ({{m|zh|海}}) of people ({{m|zh|人}})".
